dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The copper-based mixed waste recycling process described is intended for the recovery of high-value copper from slag waste. The copper slag concentrate derived from the slag flotation process is primarily used for the purpose of returning high copper content secondary slag back to the smelting phase in metal recycling industries. This recycling process is typically applied within industrial settings, such as a metal recycling enterprise located in Jiangxi Province, China, where it ensures the efficient recovery of copper from smelting by-products.
所描述的铜基混合废物回收过程旨在从渣浆废料中回收高价值的铜。通过矿渣浮选工艺得到的铜渣精矿主要用于将含铜量高的二次渣返回到金属回收行业的熔炼阶段。该回收过程通常应用于工业环境中，例如位于中国江西省的金属回收企业，在那里它确保了从冶炼副产品中高效回收铜。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: We consider the functional unit of the recycling of copper-based mixed waste to be 1000 kg electrolytic copper.

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: To accurately assess the environmental impact of the copper-based mixed waste recycling, users of the LCA data set should implement the following methodological guidelines: Prioritize the utilization of foreground data, which includes direct measurements and calculations from the metal recycling enterprise itself, for higher precision in LCA modeling. Employ the GaBi 9.0 software to quantify inventory, resource consumption, and waste emissions for each unit mass of recycled material. Apply the LCA-ReCiPe 2016 method for life cycle inventory characterization and normalization, taking into account midpoint and endpoint impacts. The functional unit for evaluation should be consistent, considering 1000 kg of electrolytic copper as the benchmark for recycling performance.
为了准确评估铜基混合废物回收的环境影响，LCA数据集的用户应当实施以下方法论指导原则：优先使用前台数据，包括金属回收企业本身的直接测量和计算，以提高LCA建模的精确度。采用GaBi 9.0软件量化每单位质量回收材料的库存、资源消耗和废物排放。应用LCA-ReCiPe 2016生命周期清单特征化和归一化方法，考虑中点和终点影响。评估时应保持功能单元的一致性，将1000公斤电解铜作为回收性能的基准。
